name: Van Aroma Propenyl Guaethol (Vanitrope) (CL-805)
description: Van Aroma is one of the leading producers of Propenyl Guaethol (Vanitrope). Van Aroma is one of the biggest exporters in Indonesia. We produce and export Propenyl Guaethol (Vanitrope) from sustainable and fully traceable sources.FSSC 22000, Kosher and Halal Certified.An unusual and interesting material, probably more familiar to flavorists than perfumers, propenyl Guaethol or Vanitrope is both a lovely, fine quality scent in its own right in the vanilla range. It is also very useful as a booster for vanillin and ethyl vanillin, especially in situations where discoloration caused by those materials could be a problem, such as in candles or soaps. Intensely sweet, vanilla-like, clove-like, medicinal phenolic.CAS No: 94-86-0EC No: 202-370-0FEMA No: 2922JECFA No: 1264 Intensely sweet, vanilla-like, clove-like, medicinal phenolicProduct Synonyms: vanitrope, propenyl, guaethol, PROPENYLGUAETHOL, 94-86-0, Isosafroeugenol, 2-Ethoxy-5-(1-propenyl)phenol, trans-2-Ethoxy-5-(1-propenyl)phenol, 1-Ethoxy-2-hydroxy-4-propenybenzene;m-Anol,6-ethoxy-;Isosafroeugenol;Vanitrope;Hydroxy methyl anethol,VANIBON
